Upcoming shows

Find your next movie while you sit on the couch. Browse our extensive selection of movies from the comfort of your own home and find your next favorite flick.

How to get started

Ready to experience movie madness at KinoXP Cinema? Here's how:

  1. Reserve your seats: Use our online booking system to select your seats and purchase your tickets in advance. That way, you can be sure you'll have the best seats in the house.
  2. Show your QR code: When you arrive at the cinema, simply show your QR code to one of our friendly employees. They'll scan it to confirm your booking and let you in to enjoy the movie.
  3. Get ready for movie madness: With our state-of-the-art facilities, comfortable seating, and delicious snacks, you're in for a movie experience like no other. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show!

Don't miss out on the fun. Book your tickets now and get ready for movie madness at KinoXP Cinema!
